W19_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W19_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_TITLE.text: The World of the Colossal Tree

W19_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You descended upon the Great Treeâ€”a world teeming with life. If there's anywhere a spirit should come easy, it's here.

W19_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_NORMAL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_NORMAL_DETAIL.text: You sense a somewhat powerful spirit.

W19_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_HARD_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_HARD_DETAIL.text: You sense a very powerful spirit.

W19_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_VH_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_VH_DETAIL.text: Think carefully about whether or not you should engage this spirit.

W19_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.text: You acquired a spirit's power. Continue your journey and secure even more spiritual power.

W19_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDEXIT_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDEXIT_100_DETAIL.text: You acquired power from all the spirits. All that's left is to return to Miyako City.
